Our Services!

What We Provide

We provide a full range of plumbing services, including drain cleaning, water heaters, furnace, leak detection, garbage disposals, sewer locating and repair and toilet and faucet repairs, new plumbing fixtures and appliances installation.



Garvey's Plumbing has been proudly serving Weddington and the surrounding areas for many years and can help you with your plumbing needs.



You can book a service call or contact us with any questions.
